meanings.sent1: The mispositioned book fell off the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The mispositioned chair made the room look messy.
meanings.sent3: The mispositioned sign pointed in the wrong direction, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her mispositioned glasses gave her a skewed view of the world.
meanings.sent5: The mispositioned painting hung crookedly on the wall, drawing attention.

meanings.definition: Placed or located in the wrong position.
meanings.sent1: The mispositioned keys were hard to find in the dark.
meanings.sent2: The mispositioned clock showed the wrong time.
meanings.sent3: The mispositioned socks ended up in the wrong drawers.
meanings.sent4: His mispositioned hat made him look comical.
meanings.sent5: The mispositioned chair blocked the doorway, causing a hindrance.
